thread.title: NEW Stroller, Travel System, Car Seat
thread.title_full: NEW Stroller, Travel System, Car Seat

title: NEW Stroller, Travel System, Car Seat
text: New Stroller/ Travel System/ car Seat Stroller in Community, VA Originally Posted On: Oodle Additional Comments: NEW Luxury Silver Cross Travel System. Originally $1400. Selling for $850 OBO All the elegance and benefits of traditional carriage with convenience of modern travel systems. Includes: 1) European style bassinet pram. Designed specifically to be safely ventilated for sleep from birth (used for a few weeks). Converts into fully reversible stroller with detachable hood and quilted foot muff (brand new). 2) Chassis features large spoke wheels, air-filled tires and world famous Silver Cross suspension for smoothest ride out there. Folds down to easily fit in trunk like any other stroller. 3) BRAND NEW NEVER USED Car seat. Rear- facing. Clips onto chassis. Head support offers maximum side impact protection. Can be installed with either a seat belt or with the isofix base (included). Includes apron to keep baby warm. 4) Simplofix Isofix Base. Has indicators to show green when correctly installed to prevent common problem of incorrectly fitted car seat. 5) BRAND NEW NEVER USED raincover.
